snippet: The president will meet with the leaders of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania concerning the conflict in Ukraine and the administration’s commitment to NATO.
abstract: Pres Obama will travel to Estonia in September to reassure Baltic allies that they have the support of the United States as tensions rise over Russian intervention in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The president will meet with the leaders of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania concerning the conflict in Ukraine and the administration’s commitment to NATO.

headline.main: Obama to Visit Estonia to Reassure Baltic Allies
headline.print_headline: Obama to Visit Estonia to Reassure Baltic Allies
